name: Shutter Labs
description:
"What if the companion cube was a dice with abilities on each face?"

... that's what Shutter Labs is.


Work your way through 25 intricately designed puzzles using your trusty Shutter Cube as leverage to reach higher platforms... But keep in mind that each throw, is a dice roll, potentially causing you to swap places with your cube or you know, spontaneously combust!

  • Solve 25 intricate puzzles designed to subvert your expectations
  • Unlock a variety of abilities that can be used at anytime to overcome challenges
  • Uncover a myriad of carefully placed Easter eggs
  • Dive deep into the game's development with the included dev commentary and "Making Of Video"


GMTK Game Jam
This game was originally developed in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 where the theme was "Roll of the Dice". Later on after the Jam deadline, we spent 48 more hours to polish the experience and release it here on Steam. The original Game Jam version is included in the game's folders.
